channel.title: Need help! brand new to server coding and all that stuff (:
channel.description: Okay, i downloaded an Allstarscape v2 source, yes i know, its a 317 and all that stuff and its glitchy. But ive always loved allstar cause it was sooooooo much fun (: anyways, i downloaded a course, buuut it never came with a client. I wanna run my server offline for awhile, while i add stuff and make everything look cool! I need a client for it that wont give me any nulls or anything. And if i do get a client, how do i like, connect it to my server while still being offline. I know this might be nooby question and it might have already been answered on another thread, but i just want someone to help my personal thread. Thank you everyone! (:

item.title: Need help! brand new to server coding and all that stuff (:
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

Ive never coded allstar noar every wanted to touch allstar, but http://lmgtfy.com/?q=Allstar+Client you can always use google it will never fail you and if you want to connect both the “source, and the client” you have the change the ip’s that its set under.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help! brand new to server coding and all that stuff (:
